law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 78, sec. 30, effective June 25, 2009. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 118, sec. 15, effective July 15, 1998; and ch. 120, sec. 5, effective July 15, 1998.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/98). This section was created by 1998 Ky. Acts chs. 118 and 120 which have been codified together. Section 15 of Acts Chapter 118 is substantively identical to subsection (3) of Section 5 of Acts Chapter 120.
